Trigger.name: Alertness (Achaea+Imperian)
Trigger.script:
mmp.alertness = mmp.alertness or {}
local alertness = mmp.alertness
local roomexists, getRoomName, anytolong, matches, deleteLine = mmp.roomexists, getRoomName, mmp.anytolong, matches, deleteLine
if mmp.debug then mmp.alertnessTime = mmp.alertnessTime or createStopWatch() startStopWatch(mmp.alertnessTime) end
for k, v in pairs (gmcp.Room.Info.exits) do local longexitname = mmp.anytolong(k) if roomexists(v) and matches[3]:lower() == getRoomName(v):lower() and longexitname then alertness[longexitname] = alertness[longexitname] or {} alertness[longexitname][#alertness[longexitname]+1] = matches[2] deleteLine()
end end
local currentroomname = mmp.cleanroomname(mmp.currentroomname)
if matches[3] == currentroomname then alertness.here = alertness.here or {} alertness.here[#alertness.here+1] = matches[2] deleteLine() end
mmp.pdb[matches[2]] = matches[3] mmp.pdb_lastupdate[matches[2]] = true
enableTrigger"Mudlet Mapper prompt trigger"
if mmp.debug then mmp.echo("alertness trigger for "..matches[2].." took "..stopStopWatch(mmp.alertnessTime).."s.") end

Trigger.name: Mudlet Mapper prompt trigger
Trigger.script:
-- to be enabled by functions that need it and disabled after it's done. Sort of like a cheap prompttrigger from Svo.
-- handle alertness if mmp.alertness and next(mmp.alertness) then
local dirs = {} for direction, _ in pairs(mmp.alertness) do dirs[#dirs+1] = direction end local people = select(2, next(mmp.alertness)) or {}
moveCursor(0, getLineNumber())
if ndb then local getcolor = ndb.getcolor for i = 1, #people do people[i] = getcolor(people[i])..people[i] end end
cinsertText("<red>[<cyan>" .. table.concat(dirs, ', ') .. " <red>-"..(#dirs > 1 and ("\n ") or '').." <white>" .. ((svo and svo.concatand) and svo.concatand(people) or table.concat(people, ', ')) .. "<cyan> ("..#people..")<red>]\n")
moveCursorEnd()
mmp.alertness = nil
raiseEvent("mmapper updated pdb") end
-- reset names we last seen, so scripts can be efficient -- not finished yet --if next(mmp.pdb_lastupdate) then -- mmp.pdb_lastupdate = {} --end
disableTrigger"Mudlet Mapper prompt trigger"

lockSpecialExit(mmp.currentroom, mmp.speedWalkPath[speedWalkCounter], "worm warp", true)
local destination = mmp.speedWalkPath[#mmp.speedWalkPath]
mmp.stop()
mmp.clearpathcache() -- clear cache so mmp.getPath accounts for the new way
if not mmp.getPath(mmp.currentroom, destination) then mmp.echo(string.format("Don't know how to get to %d (%s) anymore :( Move into a room we know of to continue", destination, getRoomName(destination))) else mmp.gotoRoom(destination) end end

-- pad spaces so we have aligned roomname echo(string.rep(" ", 13 - #getCurrentLine()))

Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("Elist gate", 0) checkingElist = false elistreader.vialReport() disableTrigger("Elist gate")

regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()

Alias.name: delete old profiles
Alias.script:
deleteOldProfiles(matches[3], matches[2]=="maps")
--Syntax examples: "delete old profiles" -> deletes profiles older than 31 days -- "delete old maps 10" -> deletes maps older than 10 days

Alias.name: `echo
Alias.script:
local s = matches[2]
s = string.gsub(s, "%$", "
") feedTriggers("
" .. s .. "
") echo("
")

Alias.name: run lua code
Alias.script:
local f,e = loadstring("return "..matches[2]) if not f then f,e = assert(loadstring(matches[2])) end
local r = f() if r ~= nil then display(r) end

Alias.name: Buy
Alias.script: send("open " .. myPack) send("get sovereigns from " .. myPack) send("buy " .. matches[2]) send("put sovereigns in " .. myPack) send("close " .. myPack)

Alias.name: Unpack
Alias.script: send("open " .. myPack) send("get " .. matches[2] .." from " .. myPack) send("close " .. myPack)

Alias.name: Pack Gold
Alias.script: send("open " .. myPack) send("put sovereigns in " .. myPack) send("close " .. myPack)

Alias.name: Probe
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "pack" then send("open " ..myPack) send("probe " .. myPack) send("more") send("close " ..myPack) else send("probe " .. matches[2]) end

Alias.name: Pack Stuff
Alias.script: send("open " .. myPack) send("put " .. matches[2] .. " in " .. myPack) send("close " .. myPack)

Alias.name: Pacify ents
Alias.script: send("order nightmare passive") send("order daemonite passive")

Alias.name: Tumble
Alias.script: if svo.defc.riding then svo.defs.keepup("riding", false) send("dismount") end normalAttack(tumbleUse.." "..matches[2])

Alias.name: Ally Target
Alias.script: allyTarget = matches[2]:title() cecho("\n<red>[<green>ICARUS ") cecho("<green> ALLY TARGETTING<red>]: <white>" .. allyTarget) fillLabels()

Alias.script: send("unwield right") send("wield eye") send("throw eye at ground")

Alias.name: Soul Spear Target
Alias.script:
clearQueue() wieldSoulspear() if matches[2] == "" then send("throw soulspear at " .. target .." up") send("throw soulspear at " .. target .." down") send("throw soulspear at " .. target .." west") send("throw soulspear at " .. target .." north") send("throw soulspear at " .. target .." south") send("throw soulspear at " .. target .." east") send("throw soulspear at " .. target .." southwest") send("throw soulspear at " .. target .." southeast") send("throw soulspear at " .. target .." northwest") send("throw soulspear at " .. target .." northeast") send("throw soulspear at " .. target .." in") send("throw soulspear at " .. target .." out")
else send("throw soulspear at " .. target .." ".. matches[2]) end

Alias.name: Blindness

Alias.name: Paralyse/Impatience (6)
Alias.script: if noAfflictions() then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "impatience" elseif enemyAfflictions["paralysis"] then d1 = "impatience" d2 = "asthma" elseif enemyAfflictions["asthma"] then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "impatience" end deadeyes(d1,d2)

Alias.name: Empress Ally
Alias.script: if not checkRoom("a monolith sigil") then useAllyCard("empress") else send("get monolith") svo.boxDisplay("EMPRESS FAILED. MONO IN ROOM", "dark_slate_gray:red") end

Alias.script: send("outd lust") send("outd aeon") send("outd aeon") send("charge aeon") send("charge aeon") send("charge lust")

Alias.name: Throw Death
Alias.script: svo.app("on") send("charge death") send("fling death at "..target)

Alias.name: Defup Alias
Alias.script: if matches[2]:title() == "Apostate" then echo("Deffing up for Apostate") --freeDefups = getFreeDefups("Apostate") --herbDefups = getHerbDefups("Apostate") --balanceDefups = getBalanceDefups("Apostate") deffingUpClass = "Apostate" defupGo(deffingUpClass) deffingUp = true elseif matches[2]:title() == "Jester" then echo("Deffing up for Jester") deffingUpClass = "Jester" defupGo(deffingUpClass) deffingUp = true elseif matches[2]:title() == "Serpent" then echo("Deffing up for Serpent") deffingUpClass = "Serpent" defupGo(deffingUpClass) deffingUp = true elseif matches[2]:title() == "Dragon" then echo("Deffing up for Dragon") deffingUp = true end

Alias.name: Keep Mass
Alias.script: if not keep["mass"] then Iecho("Keeping Mass") keep["Mass"] = true else Iecho("Not Keeping Mass") keep["Mass"] = false end

Alias.name: Pause Toggle
Alias.script: if pauseStatus == true then pauseStatus = false cecho("<purple>[<white>UNPAUSING<purple>]") else pauseStatus = true cecho("<purple>[<white>PAUSING<purple>]") end

Alias.name: Curing Toggle
Reset
Alias.script:
if matches[2] == "defup" then deffingUp = false
elseif matches[2] == "affs" then check.aeon = false waitingForSmoke = false earlyWrithingWebTimer = nil writheWaiting = false writhingWebs = false writhingRopes = false writhingImpale = false balanceList["herb"] = true balanceList["salve"] = true waitingForResto = false resetAffs() echo("RESETTING sendingHerb
") echo("RESETTING HerbBalance
") echo("RESETTING sendingOutrift
") echo("RESETTING sendingEat
") elseif matches[2] == "sip" then balanceList["sip"] = true sipAICheck = false echo("RESETTING sendingSip
") echo("RESETTING sipBalance
") echo("RESETTING sipAICheck
") elseif matches[2] == "defs" then resetTable(def) deffingUp = false echo("RESETTING DEFENSES
") echo("RESETTING DEFFING UP
")
elseif matches[2] == "smoke" then
elseif matches[2] == "sends" then resetTable(sending) display(sending) end

Alias.script: if matches[3] == nil then getink(matches[2], "me") else getink(matches[2], matches[3]) end inknext()

Alias.name: Go to ID or area
Alias.script:
local where = matches[2]:lower() local gallop if command:ends("gallop") then gallop = "gallop" where = where:sub(1, -8) elseif command:ends("sprint") then gallop = "sprint" where = where:sub(1, -8) elseif command:ends("dash") then gallop = "dash" where = where:sub(1, -6) elseif command:ends("runaway") then gallop = "runaway" where = where:sub(1, -9) elseif command:ends("glide") then gallop = "glide" where = where:sub(1, -7) end
if mmp.debug then mmp.gotoPerf = mmp.gotoPerf or createStopWatch() startStopWatch(mmp.gotoPerf) end
-- goto room ID if tonumber(where) then mmp.gotoRoom(where, gallop) else -- goto area local split = where:split(" ") if tonumber(split[#split]) then mmp.gotoArea(where:sub(1, -#(split[#split])-2), tonumber(split[#split]), gallop) else mmp.gotoArea(where, nil, gallop) end end
if mmp.debug then mmp.echo("goto alias took "..stopStopWatch(mmp.gotoPerf).."s to run.") end

Alias.name: View roomID or area
Alias.script:
local where = matches[2]
if not where then centerview(mmp.currentroom) elseif tonumber(where) then -- view a room ID centerview(where) else -- view an area mmp.viewArea (where) end

Alias.name: Option
Alias.script:
if not matches[2] then mmp.settings:showAllOptions() return end
local val = matches[4] if val == "true" or val == "yes" or val == "on" then val = true end if val == "false" or val == "no" or val == "off" then val = false end
mmp.settings:setOption(matches[3], val)

Alias.name: Manually set the room coordinates
Alias.script:
-- want the current room, but we're lost if matches[2] == '' and (not mmp.currentroom or not mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom)) then mmp.echo("Don't know where we are at the moment.") return end
-- want another room, but it doesn't actually exist if matches[2] ~= '' and not mmp.roomexists(matches[2]) then mmp.echo("v"..matches[2].." doesn't exist.") return end
local m = matches[3] local rid, rname = (matches[2] ~= "" and matches[2] or mmp.currentroom), (matches[2] ~= "" and getRoomName(matches[2]) or mmp.currentroomname) local x,y,z
local function set() -- small func to set things setRoomCoordinates(rid, x, y, z) mmp.echo(string.format("%s (%d) is now at %dx, %dy, %dz.\n", rname, rid, x,y,z)) centerview(rid) end
-- let's be flexible and allow several ways if giving an arg -- rc x y z x,y,z = string.match(m, "(%-?%d+) (%-?%d+) (%-?%d+)") if x then set(); return end
-- rc xx? yy? zz? x,y,z = string.match(m, "(%-?%d+)x"), string.match(m, "(%-?%d+)y"), string.match(m, "(%-?%d+)z") if x or y or z then -- merge w/ old coords if any are missing local ox, oy, oz = getRoomCoordinates(rid) x = x or ox; y = y or oy; z = z or oz set(); return end
-- rc left/west, right/east, ... local ox, oy, oz = getRoomCoordinates(rid) local has = table.contains for w in string.gmatch(m, "%a+") do if has({"west", "left", "w", "l"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) elseif has({"east", "right", "e", "r"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) elseif has({"north", "top", "n", "t"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"south", "bottom", "s", "b"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"northwest", "topleft", "nw", "tl"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"northeast", "topright", "ne", "tr"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"southeast", "bottomright", "se", "br"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"southwest", "bottomleft", "sw", "bl"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"up", "u"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) + 1 elseif has({"down", "d"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) - 1 end
end if x then set(); return end
mmp.echo([[Where do you want to move the room to? You can use direct coordinates or relative directions.]])

Alias.name: Add a special exit
Alias.script:
-- spe clear and spe list match on this if matches[2] == "clear" or matches[2] == "list" then return end
-- need the current room, but we're lost if not mmp.currentroom or not mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) then mmp.echo("Don't know where we are at the moment.") return end
local otherroom = tonumber(matches[2]) or mmp.relativeroom(mmp.currentroom, matches[2])
-- need the another room, but it doesn't actually exist if not otherroom or not mmp.roomexists(otherroom) then mmp.echo(matches[2].." doesn't exist.") return end
addSpecialExit(mmp.currentroom, tonumber(otherroom), matches[3]) addSpecialExit(mmp.currentroom, tonumber(otherroom), matches[3]) mmp.echo(string.format("Added special exit with command '%s' to %s (%d).", matches[3], getRoomName(otherroom), otherroom)) centerview(mmp.currentroom)

Alias.name: Add a special exit from one remote room to another
Alias.script:
local room1, room2 = tonumber(matches[2]), tonumber(matches[3])
if not room1 or not mmp.roomexists(room1) then mmp.echo("Room #"..matches[2].." doesn't exist - create it first, or make sure you got the room ID right?") return end
if not room2 or not mmp.roomexists(room2) then mmp.echo("Room #"..matches[3].." doesn't exist - create it first, or make sure you got the room ID right?") return end
addSpecialExit(room1, room2, matches[4]) mmp.echo(string.format("Added special exit with command '%s' to from %s (%d) to %s (%d).", matches[4], getRoomName(room1), room1, getRoomName(room2), room2))

Alias.name: Clear all special exits
Alias.script:
-- want the current room, but we're lost if not matches[2] and (not mmp.currentroom or not mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom)) then mmp.echo("Don't know where we are at the moment.") return end
-- want another room, but it doesn't exist if matches[2] and tonumber(matches[2]) and not mmp.roomexists(matches[2]) then mmp.echo("v"..matches[2].." doesn't exist.") return end
-- or a relative one if matches[2] and not tonumber(matches[2]) and not mmp.relativeroom(mmp.currentroom, matches[2]) then mmp.echo("There is no room "..matches[2].. " of us.") return end
local rid = (not matches[2] and mmp.currentroom or (tonumber(matches[2]) or mmp.relativeroom(mmp.currentroom, matches[2])))
clearSpecialExits(rid) mmp.echo(string.format("Cleared all special exits in %s (%d).\n", getRoomName(rid), rid))

Alias.name: Create a room
Alias.script:
local m = matches[2] local rid, rname if mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) then rid, rname = mmp.currentroom, mmp.currentroomname end local x,y,z
local function set(newid) -- small func to set things local rid = newid or createRoomID() addRoom(rid) setRoomCoordinates(rid, x, y, z) if mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) then setRoomArea(rid, getRoomArea(mmp.currentroom)) end if mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) then setRoomEnv(rid, getRoomEnv(mmp.currentroom)) end setExit(mmp.currentroom, rid, m) mmp.echo(string.format("Created new room (%d) at %dx, %dy, %dz.\n", rid, x,y,z)) centerview(mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) and mmp.currentroom or rid) if not mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) then mmp.currentroom = rid; mmp.currentroomname = "" end end
-- let's be flexible and allow several ways if giving an arg -- rc v# x y z newid, x,y,z = string.match(m, "v(%d+) (%-?%d+) (%-?%d+) (%-?%d+)") if x then set(newid); return end
-- rc x y z x,y,z = string.match(m, "(%-?%d+) (%-?%d+) (%-?%d+)") if x then set(); return end
if not rid then mmp.echo("Don't know where we are at the moment in order to use relative coordinates.") return end
-- rc xx? yy? zz? x,y,z = string.match(m, "(%-?%d+)x"), string.match(m, "(%-?%d+)y"), string.match(m, "(%-?%d+)z") if x or y or z then -- merge w/ old coords if any are missing local ox, oy, oz = getRoomCoordinates(rid) x = x or ox; y = y or oy; z = z or oz set(); return end
-- rc left/west, right/east, ... local ox, oy, oz = getRoomCoordinates(rid) local has = table.contains for w in string.gmatch(m, "%a+") do if has({"west", "left", "w", "l"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) elseif has({"east", "right", "e", "r"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) elseif has({"north", "top", "n", "t"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"south", "bottom", "s", "b"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"northwest", "topleft", "nw", "tl"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"northeast", "topright", "ne", "tr"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"southeast", "bottomright", "se", "br"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"southwest", "bottomleft", "sw", "bl"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"up", "u"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) + 1 elseif has({"down", "d"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) - 1 end
end if x then set(); return end
mmp.echo([[Where do you want to move the room to? You can use direct coordinates or relative directions.]])

Alias.name: Create a link between two rooms
Alias.script:
-- need the current room, but we're lost if not mmp.currentroom or not mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) then mmp.echo("Don't know where we are at the moment.") return end
-- make sure the dir is valid local dir = mmp.anytolong(matches[3]) if not dir then mmp.echo(matches[3].." isn't a valid normal exit.") return end
-- if we don't give a room number, then we want to auto-locate an appropriate room nearby. local otherroom if matches[2] == "" then local w = matches[3] local ox, oy, oz, x,y,z = getRoomCoordinates(mmp.currentroom) local has = table.contains if has({"west", "left", "w", "l"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) elseif has({"east", "right", "e", "r"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) elseif has({"north", "top", "n", "t"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"south", "bottom", "s", "b"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"northwest", "topleft", "nw", "tl"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"northeast", "topright", "ne", "tr"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy) + 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"southeast", "bottomright", "se", "br"}, w) then x = (x or ox) + 1; y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"southwest", "bottomleft", "sw", "bl"}, w) then x = (x or ox) - 1; y = (y or oy) - 1; z = (z or oz) elseif has({"up", "u"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) + 1 elseif has({"down", "d"}, w) then x = (x or ox); y = (y or oy); z = (z or oz) - 1 end
local carea = getRoomArea(mmp.currentroom) if not carea then mmp.echo("Don't know what area are we in.") return end
otherroom = select(2, next(getRoomsByPosition(carea,x,y,z)))
if not otherroom then mmp.echo("There isn't a room to the "..w.." that I see - try with an exact room id.") return end
else if not mmp.roomexists(matches[2]) then -- check that an explicit other room ID is valid mmp.echo("A room with id "..matches[2].. " doesn't exist.") return else otherroom = tonumber(matches[2]) end end
if setExit(mmp.currentroom, otherroom, matches[3]) then if not matches[4] then setExit(otherroom, mmp.currentroom, mmp.ranytolong(matches[3])) end
mmp.echo(string.format("Linked %s (%d) to %s (%d) via a %s%s exit.", (getRoomName(mmp.currentroom) ~= "" and getRoomName(mmp.currentroom) or "''"), mmp.currentroom, (getRoomName(otherroom) ~= "" and getRoomName(otherroom) or "''"), otherroom, (matches[4] and "one-way " or ''), matches[3])) else mmp.echo("Couldn't create an exit.") end centerview(mmp.currentroom)

Alias.name: Delete a room
Alias.script:
-- want the current room, but we're lost if not matches[2] and (not mmp.currentroom or not mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom)) then mmp.echo("Don't know where we are at the moment.") return end
-- want another room, but it doesn't exist if matches[2] and tonumber(matches[2]) and not mmp.roomexists(matches[2]) then mmp.echo("v"..matches[2].." doesn't exist.") return end
-- or a relative one if matches[2] and not tonumber(matches[2]) and not mmp.relativeroom(mmp.currentroom, matches[2]) then mmp.echo("There is no room "..matches[2].. " of us.") return end
local rid = (not matches[2] and mmp.currentroom or (tonumber(matches[2]) or mmp.relativeroom(mmp.currentroom, matches[2])))
local n = getRoomName(rid) deleteRoom(rid) mmp.echo(string.format("Deleted the %s (%d) room.\n", (n ~= "" and n or "''"), rid)) centerview(mmp.currentroom)

Alias.name: Delete a link
Alias.script:
-- need the current room, but we're lost if not mmp.currentroom or not mmp.roomexists(mmp.currentroom) then mmp.echo("Don't know where we are at the moment.") return end
-- make sure the dir is valid local dir = mmp.anytolong(matches[2]) if not dir then mmp.echo(matches[2].." isn't a valid normal exit.") return end
-- gone already? if not getRoomExits(mmp.currentroom)[dir] then mmp.echo(dir.." link doesn't exist already.") end
-- locate the room on the other end, so we can unlink it from there as well if necessary local otherroom if getRoomExits(getRoomExits(mmp.currentroom)[dir])[mmp.ranytolong(dir)] then otherroom = getRoomExits(mmp.currentroom)[dir] end
if setExit(mmp.currentroom, -1, dir) then if otherroom then if setExit(otherroom, -1, mmp.ranytolong(dir)) then mmp.echo(string.format("Deleted the %s exit from %s (%d).", dir, getRoomName(mmp.currentroom), mmp.currentroom)) else mmp.echo("Couldn't delete the incoming exit.") end else mmp.echo(string.format("Deleted the one-way %s exit from %s (%d).", dir, getRoomName(mmp.currentroom), mmp.currentroom)) end else mmp.echo("Couldn't delete the outgoing exit.") end centerview(mmp.currentroom)

Alias.name: Set a room character
Set room weight
Alias.script:
local weight = tonumber(matches[3]), room if matches[2] == '' then room = mmp.currentroom else room = tonumber(matches[2]) or mmp.relativeroom(mmp.currentroom, matches[2]) end
if not room or not mmp.roomexists(room) then mmp.echo("Sorry - which room do you want to set the weight on? I don't know where you are at the moment, if you want to do the current room.") return end
if not weight then mmp.echo("What weight do you want to set on #"..room.."?") end
local oldweight = getRoomWeight(room) setRoomWeight(room, weight)
if weight > oldweight then mmp.echo("Increased the room weight on #"..room.." ("..getRoomName(room)..") by "..(weight-oldweight).." to "..weight.." - making it less desirable to travel through.") elseif weight < oldweight then mmp.echo("Decreased the room weight on #"..room.." ("..getRoomName(room)..") by "..(oldweight-weight).." to "..weight.." - making it more desirable to travel through.") else mmp.echo("The room weight on #"..room.." ("..getRoomName(room)..") is already "..weight..".") end

Alias.name: Set exit weight
Alias.script:
local room = (matches[2] ~= "" and tonumber(matches[2]) or mmp.currentroom)
local weight, exit = tonumber(matches[3]), matches[4]
if not roomExists(room) then mmp.echo("Room "..room.." doesn't exist. It has to before we can set weights on exits.") return end
setExitWeight(room, exit, weight)
mmp.echo(string.format("Set the weight on the %d room going %s to %s. If it's a two-way exit, please set the reverse exit as well.", room, exit, weight))

Alias.name: Add/delete doors
Alias.script:
local room = (matches[2] ~= "" and tonumber(matches[2]) or mmp.currentroom)
local direction, status = matches[3], matches[4]
if not roomExists(room) then mmp.echo("Room "..room.." doesn't exist. It has to before we can make doors in it.") return end
local validdirs = {'e', 's', 'w', 'n', 'ne', 'se', 'sw', 'nw', 'in', 'out', 'up', 'down'}
if not table.contains(validdirs, direction) then mmp.echo("Can't make a door in the '"..direction.."' direction - available choices are:\n "..table.concat(validdirs, ', ')) return end
local statusnum
if status == "" or status == "open" or status == "o" then statusnum = 1 elseif status == "closed" or status == "c" then statusnum = 2 elseif status == "locked" or status == "l" then statusnum = 3 elseif status == "clear" or status == "gone" then statusnum = 0 end
if not statusnum then mmp.echo("Unrecognized option - a door can be open, closed, locked or gone.") return end
setDoor(room, direction, statusnum)
if statusnum == 0 then mmp.echo("OK, door removed.") else mmp.echo("OK, door added/adjusted.") end

Alias.name: Create an area
Alias.script:
local t = getAreaTable(); local tr = {}; for k,v in pairs(t) do tr[v] = k end local newid = table.maxn(tr) + 1
setAreaName( newid, matches[2] ) mmp.echo(string.format("Created new area %s (%d)", matches[2], newid)) centerview(mmp.currentroom) raiseEvent("mmp areas changed")

Alias.name: Cancel area deletion
Alias.script:
if not mmp.deletingarea then mmp.echo("I wasn't deleting any areas already.") return end
local areaname = mmp.deletingarea.areaname mmp.deletingarea = nil
mmp.echo("Stopped deleting rooms in the '"..areaname.."'. The area is partially missing its rooms now, you'll want to restart the process to finish it.")

Alias.name: List continents
Add area to continent
Alias.script:
-- ac continent [optional area]
local continent = matches[2]:title() local area if not matches[3] then area = getRoomArea(mmp.currentroom) elseif tonumber(matches[3]) then area = tonumber(matches[3]) if getRoomAreaName(area) == -1 then area = nil end else local areas = getAreaTable()
for karea, id in pairs(areas) do if karea:lower():find(matches[3]:lower(), 1, true) then area = id break end end end
if not area then mmp.echo(matches[3].." isn't a known area. Which one do you want to set?") return end
local tmp = getRoomUserData(1, "areaContinents") local continents = {}
if tmp ~= "" then continents = yajl.to_value(tmp) end
if not continents[continent] and mmp.addingcontinent ~= continent then mmp.addingcontinent = continent mmp.echo("Continent "..continent.." isn't known so far - would you like to make a new one? Do this command again if so.") return end
mmp.addingcontinent = nil
continents[continent] = continents[continent] or {}
-- have to use this instead of contains and index_of, because those count keys as well - and we don't want that local function index_of(data, areaID) for i = 1, #data do if data[i] == areaID then return i end end
return -1 end
if index_of(continents[continent], area) ~= -1 then mmp.echo(getRoomAreaName(area).." is already known as being on the "..continent.." continent.") return else continents[continent][#continents[continent]+1] = area -- not a key, because yajl will put a ton of null's. mmp.echo("Recorded that "..getRoomAreaName(area).." is on the "..continent.." continent.")
-- remove from other areas if moving for kcontinent, data in pairs(continents) do if kcontinent ~= continent then local i = index_of(continents[kcontinent], area) if i ~= -1 then table.remove(continents[kcontinent], i) if not next(continents[kcontinent]) then continents[kcontinent] = nil end mmp.echo("De-listed "..getRoomAreaName(area).." from the "..kcontinent.." continent.") end end end end
local toserialize = yajl.to_string(continents) setRoomUserData(1, "areaContinents", toserialize)

Alias.name: Add/remove a ferry room
Alias.script:
local room = tonumber(matches[2])
-- load the ferry rooms if they haven't been already if not mmp.ferry_rooms then local tmp = getRoomUserData(1, "ferry rooms")
mmp.ferry_rooms = {} if tmp ~= "" then for _, i in ipairs(yajl.to_value(tmp)) do mmp.ferry_rooms[i] = true end end end
if matches[3] == "add" then if mmp.ferry_rooms[room] then mmp.echo("Ferry room #"..room.." is already recorded as such.") return else mmp.ferry_rooms[room] = true; mmp.echo("Added #"..room.." to be a ferry room.") end else if not mmp.ferry_rooms[room] then mmp.echo("Room #"..room.." isn't a ferry one already.") return else mmp.ferry_rooms[room] = nil; mmp.echo("Removed #"..room.." from being a ferry room.") end end
local keys = {}; for k,_ in pairs(mmp.ferry_rooms) do keys[#keys+1] = k end
setRoomUserData(1, "ferry rooms", yajl.to_string(keys))

Alias.name: Show ferry rooms
Alias.script:
if not mmp.ferry_rooms then local tmp = getRoomUserData(1, "ferry rooms")
mmp.ferry_rooms = {} if tmp ~= "" then for _, i in ipairs(yajl.to_value(tmp)) do mmp.ferry_rooms[i] = true end end end
mmp.echo("Ferry rooms available:") if not next(mmp.ferry_rooms) then mmp.echo("(none)") return end
for k, _ in pairs(mmp.ferry_rooms) do mmp.echo(string.format(" (%d) - %s\n", k, getRoomName(k))) end

Alias.name: Weight ferry exits
Alias.script:
local c = 0 local weight = 200 for area in pairs(mmp.areatabler) do local rooms = getAreaRooms(area) or {} for i = 0, #rooms do local exits = getSpecialExits(rooms[i] or 0)
if exits and next(exits) then for exit, cmd in pairs(exits) do if type(cmd) == "table" then cmd = next(cmd) end
if (cmd:lower():find("buy passage to", 1, true)) then setExitWeight(rooms[i], cmd, weight) mmp.echo("Weighted "..cmd.." going to "..rooms[i].." ("..getRoomName(rooms[i])..").") c = c + 1 end end end end end
mmp.echo(string.format("%s ferry exits weighted to %s (so we don't take them over too short distances).", c, weight))

Alias.name: Clear the map completely
Alias.script:
if not mmp.map_delete_warning then mmp.echo("Are you really, really, really sure you want to delete all of the map to go to a blank state? Do the command again if you're certain.") mmp.map_delete_warning = true return end
mmp.echo("Okay, deleting...")
tempTimer(.1, function() for name, id in pairs(getAreaTable()) do deleteArea(tonumber(id)) end
mmp.echo("Deleted everything. It's all gone.") mmp.map_delete_warning = nil centerview(1) end)

Alias.name: Delete shop stockroom exits
Alias.script:
mmp.echo("Deleting all known stockroom exits (rooms with $ and a down exit)") local c = 0
for area, areaname in pairs(mmp.areatabler) do local rooms = getAreaRooms(area) or {} for i = 0, #rooms do local char = getRoomChar(rooms[i] or 0) if char == '$' then local exits = getRoomExits(rooms[i] or 0) -- retrieve after $, more efficient
if exits.down then setExit(rooms[i], -1, 'down') mmp.echo(string.format("Deleted the stockroom exit at %s (#%d in %s)", getRoomName(rooms[i]), rooms[i], mmp.areatabler[getRoomArea(rooms[i])])) c = c + 1 end end
end end
mmp.echo(string.format("Deleted %s known stockroom exit%s.", c, (c ~= 1 and 's' or ''))) centerview(mmp.currentroom)

Alias.name: Clear continent data
Alias.script:
if not mmp.wipingcontinents then mmp.wipingcontinents = true mmp.echo("Are you sure you want to wipe all continent data? If yes, do this again.") return end mmp.wipingcontinents = nil
local toserialize = yajl.to_string{} setRoomUserData(1, "areaContinents", toserialize) mmp.echo("Wiped all continents data.")

Alias.name: Delete suffixed periods
Alias.script:
mmp.echo("Deleting removing all periods at the end of room names...") local c = 0
for area, areaname in pairs(mmp.areatabler) do local rooms = getAreaRooms(area) or {} for i = 0, #rooms do local name = getRoomName(rooms[i] or 0) if string.ends(name, ".") then name = string.sub(name, 1, (#name-1)) setRoomName(rooms[i], name) mmp.echo(string.format("Patched up room #%s - '%s'", rooms[i], name)) c = c + 1 end end end
mmp.echo(string.format("Fixed up %s room%s.", c, (c ~= 1 and 's' or '')))

Alias.name: Find single exits
Alias.script:
local c = 0
local getAreaRooms, getRoomExits, contains, echoLink, getRoomEnv, envidsr = getAreaRooms, getRoomExits, table.contains, echoLink, getRoomEnv, mmp.envidsr
for area, id in pairs(getAreaTable()) do for _, roomid in pairs(getAreaRooms(id)) do local exits = getRoomExits(roomid) for dir, otherroom in pairs(exits) do local otherexits = getRoomExits(otherroom) or {} if not contains(otherexits, roomid) then echoLink(string.format("%s -> %s is oneway (%s->%s type)\n", roomid, otherroom, (envidsr and envidsr[getRoomEnv(roomid)] or "?"), (envidsr and envidsr[getRoomEnv(otherroom)] or "?")), [[mmp.gotoRoom(]]..roomid..[[)]], "Click to go to the start room "..roomid, true) c = c + 1 end end end end
mmp.echo(string.format("Found %s oneways.%s", c, (c > 10 and " Have fun. Click on lines to go to the rooms." or "")))

Alias.name: Show char marks
Alias.script:
local c = 0 local m = {} local areas = getAreaTable() local show_area = table.size(areas) > 1 and true or false
for area, id in pairs(areas) do for _, roomid in pairs(getAreaRooms(id)) do local c = getRoomChar(roomid) if c ~= '' and c ~= ' ' then m[c] = m[c] or {} m[c][#m[c]+1] = roomid end end end
if not next(m) then mmp.echo("This map has no char marks on it. Do mc on and rcc <mark> in a room to add them!") return end
for letter, rooms in pairs(m) do table.sort(rooms) mmp.echo("Rooms with the <blue>"..letter.."<reset> character on them:") for i = 1, #rooms do if not show_area then cecho(string.format(" <sea_green>%-5s<reset> %s\n", rooms[i], getRoomName(rooms[i]))) else cecho(string.format(" <sea_green>%-5s<reset> %-35s <dim_grey>(in<reset> %s<dim_grey>)\n", rooms[i], getRoomName(rooms[i]), mmp.areatabler[getRoomArea(rooms[i])])) end end end

Alias.name: Delete all special exits across a map
Toggle mapping mode
Save a map
Alias.script:
local function s(loc) if not saveMap(loc) then mmp.echo("Couldn't save the map :(") else if loc ~= "" then mmp.echo("Map saved.") else mmp.echo("Saved the default map.") end end end
if not saveMap then mmp.echo("Your Mudlet can't save maps. Please upgrade it!") else if matches[2] and matches[2] == "custom" then s(invokeFileDialog(false, "Please select the folder to save the map in and hit Open").."/Mudlet map from "..os.date("%A %d, %b '%y")..".dat") elseif matches[2] then s(getMudletHomeDir().."/map/"..matches[2]) else s("") end end

Alias.name: Load a map
Alias.script:
local function s(loc) if not loadMap(loc) then mmp.echo("Couldn't save the map :(") else mmp.lockWormholes(); mmp.lockSewers(); mmp.lockPebble(); if mmp.settings.waterwalk then mmp.enableWaterWalk() else mmp.disableWaterWalk() end
if loc ~= "" then mmp.echo("Map loaded.") else mmp.echo("Loaded the default map.") end raiseEvent("mmapper updated map") end end
if not loadMap then mmp.echo("Your Mudlet can't load maps. Please upgrade it!") else if matches[2] and matches[2] == "custom" then s(invokeFileDialog(true, "Please select the map file and click Open to load it")) elseif matches[2] then s(getMudletHomeDir().."/map/"..matches[2]) else s("") end end

Alias.name: Get dirs
Alias.script: if not matches[2] and not matches[3] then mmp.echo("Where do you want to showpath to?") elseif matches[2] and not matches[3] then mmp.echoPath(mmp.currentroom, matches[2]) else mmp.echoPath(matches[2], matches[3]) end

Alias.name: Check wholist
Alias.script: enableTrigger("Parse wholist") send("who b") tempTimer(10, [[disableTrigger'Parse wholist']])

Alias.name: Add Room Mark
Alias.script:
local tmp = getRoomUserData(1, "gotoMapping") local maptable = {}
if tmp ~= "" then maptable = yajl.to_value(tmp) end
local location, markname if tonumber(matches[2]) then location = matches[2]; markname = matches[3] else location = matches[3]; markname = matches[2] end
-- can't allow mark name to ne a number - yajl then generates a giant table of null's if tonumber(markname) then mmp.echo("The mark name can't be a number.") return end
maptable[markname] = location local tmp2 = yajl.to_string(maptable)
if not mmp.roomexists(1) then addRoom(1) end
setRoomUserData(1, "gotoMapping", tmp2) mmp.echo(string.format("Room mark for '%s' set to room %s.", markname, location))

Alias.name: Remove Room Mark
Alias.script:
local tmp= getRoomUserData(1, "gotoMapping") if tmp~="" then local maptable=yajl.to_value(tmp) if not maptable[matches[2]] then mmp.echo("Don't have such a mark in the db.") return end
maptable[matches[2]]=nil local tmp2=yajl.to_string(maptable) setRoomUserData(1, "gotoMapping", tmp2) mmp.echo("Removed the "..matches[2].." mark.") else mmp.echo("We don't have any marks stored anyway.") end

Alias.name: Display Room Marks
Alias.script:
local tmp= getRoomUserData(1, "gotoMapping") if tmp~="" then local maptable = yajl.to_value(tmp) or {} local sortedkeys = {} for k in pairs(maptable) do sortedkeys[#sortedkeys+1] = k end table.sort(sortedkeys)
mmp.echo("Known marks in this map:") if next(maptable) then for i = 1, #sortedkeys do echo(string.format(" %-21s %s\n", tostring(sortedkeys[i]), tostring(maptable[sortedkeys[i]]))) end else echo(" (none)\n") end else mmp.echo("No marks are recorded in this map.") end

Alias.name: Toggle map sizes
Alias.script:
local size = matches[2]
if size == "biggest" then mapper = Geyser.Mapper:new({ name = "mapper", x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "97%" }) mmp.echo("Map size set to pretty damn big.")
elseif size == "small" then mapper = Geyser.Mapper:new({ x = "70%", y = 0, width = "28%", height = "50%" }) mmp.echo("Map size set to comfortable.")
elseif size == "big" then local window_width, window_height = getMainWindowSize() local used_width = getMainConsoleWidth()
local available_space = window_width - used_width
if matches[3] then available_space = available_space - tonumber(matches[3]) end
mapper = Geyser.Mapper:new({ x = available_space*-1, y = 0, width = available_space, height = "100%" })
mmp.echo("Set the map size to big - it'll cover all of the space on the right that game text isn't using. You'll want to call this alias again if you resize the window to update.") end

Alias.name: ^make maps$
Alias.script: local c = 0 for _, id in pairs(getAreaTable()) do tempTimer(c*.5, [[exportAreaImage(]]..id..[[)]]) c = c + 1 end mmp.echo("Done!")

Alias.name: Set debug mode
Alias.script:
if matches[2] == "on" then mmp.debug = true else mmp.debug = false end
mmp.echo("Debug & performance telemetry "..(mmp.debug and "enabled" or "disabled")..".")

Alias.name: Elist Refill Decays - Put into Pack

Script.name: deleteOldProfiles
Script.script:
function deleteOldProfiles(keepdays_arg, delete_maps)
--[[ Deletes old profiles/maps in the "current"/"map" folders of the Mudlet home directory. The following files are NOT deleted: - Files newer than the amount of days specified as an argument to deleteOldProfiles(), or 31 days if not specified. - One file for every month before that. Specifically: The first available file of every month prior to this. Setting the second argument to true will delete maps instead of profiles. (e.g. deleteOldProfiles(10, true)) --]]
local keepdays = tonumber(keepdays_arg) or 31 local profile_table = {} local used_last_mod_months = {} local slash = (string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/") and "/" or "\\" local dirpath = getMudletHomeDir()..slash..(delete_maps and "map" or "current") local delnum = 0
-- Traverse the profiles folder and create a table of files: for filename in lfs.dir(dirpath) do if filename~="." and filename~=".." then profile_table[#profile_table+1] = {name = filename, last_mod = lfs.attributes(dirpath..slash..filename, "modification")} end end
-- Sort the table according to last modification date from old to new: table.sort(profile_table, function (a,b) return a.last_mod < b.last_mod end)
echo(string.format("\nDeleting old %s. Files newer than %d days and one profile for every month before that will be kept.", delete_maps and "maps" or "profiles", keepdays)) for i,v in ipairs(profile_table) do local days = math.floor(os.difftime(os.time(), v.last_mod)/86400) local last_mod_month = os.date("%Y/%m", v.last_mod) if days > keepdays then -- For profiles older than X days, check if we already kept a table for this month: if not table.contains(used_last_mod_months, last_mod_month) then -- If not, do nothing and mark this month as "kept". used_last_mod_months[#used_last_mod_months+1] = last_mod_month else -- Otherwise remove the file: local success, errorstring = os.remove(dirpath..slash..v.name) if success then delnum = delnum + 1 else cecho("\n<red>ERROR: "..errorstring) end end end end echo(string.format("\nDeletion complete. %d/%d files were removed successfully.", delnum, #profile_table)) end

Script.name: eventaffhandler
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function eventaffhandler(event, affliction) if event == "svo got aff" then gainedAff(affliction) end if event == "svo lost aff" then lostAff(affliction) end end
function gainedAff(affliction) cecho("<red>++"..affliction .." gained++
") if affliction == "prone" then proneGained() end if onlyEnabledClass("serpent") then serpentAfflictionsGained(affliction) elseif onlyEnabledClass("apostate") then apostateAfflictionsGained(affliction) end end
function lostAff(affliction) echoMyAfflictions() cecho("<green>--".. affliction .." lost--
") if table.contains(myHerbPrioList,affliction) then unPrio(affliction) end
if affliction == "prone" then proneLost() elseif onlyEnabledClass("serpent") then serpentAfflictionsLost(affliction) elseif onlyEnabledClass("apostate") then apostateAfflictionsLost(affliction) end
end
function echoMyAfflictions() clearWindow("afflictionConsole") if not svo.bals.tree then afflictionConsole:echo("!!TREE BALANCE OFF~~~

") end for name, aff in pairs(svo.affl) do if name == "bleeding" then afflictionConsole:echo(string.format("%-8s (%d)
", name, svo.affl.bleeding.count)) else afflictionConsole:echo(string.format("%-8s (%.1f)
", name, getStopWatchTime(aff.sw))) end end end

<red:yellow>------------------------------------
") cecho("<red:yellow>!TORSO WAS HIT, PAY ATTENTION IDIOT!
") cecho("<red:yellow>!TORSO WAS HIT, PAY ATTENTION IDIOT!
") cecho("<red:yellow>------------------------------------
") end end

function customIgnoreIllusion() Iecho("Custom Ignore") svo.ignore_illusion() end

Script.name: Move Priorities Functions
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function topPrio(aff) Iecho("Prioing "..aff.." for you") svo.prio_swap(aff, "herb", topHerbPosition) end
function unPrio(aff) if svo.prio.getnumber(aff, "herb") ~= myHerbPrioList[aff] then Iecho("Moving "..aff.." Back Down to "..myHerbPrioList[aff]) svo.prio.insert(aff, "herb", myHerbPrioList[aff]) end end

function resetMyPriosList(listName) if listName == "herb" then resetHerbPrioList() end end
function resetHerbPrioList() for i,v in pairs(myHerbPrioList) do echo(i.." "..v.."\n") svo.prio.insert(i, "herb", v) end end

Script.name: Serpent Affliction Handler
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function serpentAfflictionsGained(affliction) if affliction == "impatience" then topPrio("impatience") elseif affliction == "hypochondria" and svo.affl.darkshade and not svo.affl.impatience then topPrio("hypochondria") end end
function serpentAfflictionsLost(affliction) if affliction == "impatience" then if svo.affl.darkshade then topPrio("darkshade") elseif svo.affl.hypochondria then topPrio("hypochondria") end end end

function apostateAfflictionsLost(affliction)
end

Script.name: Occultist
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function Occultist() svo.tree.occultistthreeaffs = { desc = "Fighting an Occultist and have three (or more) afflictions",
function() if svo.enabledclasses.occultist and occultistAffs() >= 3 then return true end end } end
function occultistAffs() local ignore = { "prone", "bleeding", "bound", "impale", "webbed", "roped", "transfixed", "rixil", "ninkharsag" } local count = 0 for aff, _ in pairs(svo.affl) do if not table.contains(ignore, aff) then count = count + 1 end end return count end

Bard
Apostate

function Apostate() svo.tree.apostatethreeaffs = { desc = "Fighting an Apostate and have three (or more) afflictions",
function() if svo.enabledclasses.apostate and (svo.affl.hellsight and svo.affl.asthma and svo.affl.slickness) then return true end end } end
function apostateAffs() local ignore = { "prone", "bleeding", "bound", "impale", "webbed", "roped", "transfixed" } local count = 0 for aff, _ in pairs(svo.affl) do if not table.contains(ignore, aff) then count = count + 1 end end return count end

Script.name: Envenoming
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function envenomDirk(venomList) send("wipe " .. myDirk) for i,venom in ipairs(venomList) do send("secrete " .. venom .. " on " .. myDirk) end Iecho("Dirk Envenomed") end
function envenom(weapon,venom) --echo("EnvenomedWeapon = "..envenomedWeapon.." Weapon = "..weapon..", envenomedVeon = "..envenomedVenom.." Venom = "..venom) if envenomedWeapon ~= weapon or envenomedVenom ~= venom then send("wipe "..weapon) send("envenom " .. weapon .. " with " .. venom) end end
function resetEnvenoms() envenomedWeapon = "none" envenomedVenom = "none" end

Script.name: Weapon Throws
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function deliverVenom(weapon,venom) if venom == "none" then return end if juggledItems[weapon] > 0 then throwTarget(weapon,venom) elseif throwOnly then wieldNothing("left") wieldPuppet(target) send("juggle "..weapon.." ".." "..weapon.." "..weapon) else wieldDirk("left") jab("fang",venom) end end
function throwTarget(weapon,venom) envenom(weapon,venom) send("throw " .. weapon .." at " .. target) end

Script.name: Weapon Jabs
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function jab(weapon,venom) envenom(weapon,venom) send("jab " .. target) end

Script.name: Curses
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function curse(curse,hinder) clearQueue() wieldShield() wieldPuppet(target) applyCurse(curse) if not hinder then sendAttack("swiftcurse "..target.." "..curse.." invoke soulrend") else sendHinderAttack("swiftcurse "..target.." "..curse.." invoke soulrend") end end
function relapseCurse(curse,relapse) wieldShield() wieldPuppet(target) clearQueue() applyCurse(curse) sendAttack("swiftcurse "..target.." "..curse.." invoke relapse "..relapse) end
function coagulateCurse(curse,secondCurse) wieldShield() wieldPuppet(target) clearQueue() applyCurse(curse) coagulatedCurse = secondCurse sendAttack("swiftcurse "..target.." "..curse.." invoke coagulation "..secondCurse) end
function soulscourgeCurse(curse,ability) wieldShield() wieldPuppet(target) clearQueue() applyCurse(curse) sendAttack("swiftcurse "..target.." "..curse.." invoke soulscourge "..ability) end
function blight(curse) clearQueue() applyCurse(curse) sendAttack("blight "..target.." "..curse) end
function cursed(afflictedCurse) targetAfflicted(afflictedCurse) end
function applyCurse(curse) afflictedCurse = curse if curse =="paralyse" then afflictedCurse = "paralysis" elseif curse =="stupid" then afflictedCurse = "stupidity" elseif curse =="clumsy" then afflictedCurse = "clumsiness" end end
function tzantza() clearQueue() svo.app("on") sendAttack("curse "..target.." tzantza") end
function swiftcurse() resetAllTargetAffs() clearQueue() send("swiftcurse") end

Script.name: Puppetry
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function puppetAttack(attack,hinder) clearQueue() wieldShield() wieldPuppet(target) if attack == "fashion" then if not hinder then sendAttack("fashion "..dollType.." of "..target) else sendHinderAttack("fashion "..dollType.." of "..target) end resetAllTargetAffs() else sendAttack(dollAttack.." "..attack) end
end
function puppetAllyAttack(attack) if attack == "travel" and svo.affl.peace then topPrio("peace") end clearQueue() wieldShield() wieldPuppet(allyTarget) if attack == "fashion" then sendAttack("fashion "..dollType.." of "..allyTarget) resetAllTargetAffs() else sendAttack(dollAttack.." "..attack) end end

Script.name: Spiritlore
Script.script: ------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function spiritloreAttack(attack) clearQueue() wieldShield() if attack == "bloodlet" then send("invoke bloodlet " .. target) elseif attack == "snare" then send("invoke snare " .. target) elseif attack == "regeneration" then send("invoke regeneration") else sendAttack(attack) end end

Script.name: Apostate Combo 1
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function apostateCombo1() local d1 local d2
if noAfflictions() then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "clumsy" elseif checkAfflictions({"paralysis"}) then d1 = "impatience" d2 = "clumsy" elseif checkAfflictions({"clumsiness"}) then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "impatience" elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience"}) then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "stupid" elseif checkAfflictions({"confusion"}) then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "clumsy" elseif checkAfflictions({"stupidity"}) then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "impatience" elseif checkAfflictions({"vomiting"}) then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "clumsiness" elseif checkAfflictions({"paralysis","clumsiness"}) then d1 = "vomiting" d2 = "impatience" elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","paralysis"}) then d1 = "clumsy" d2 = "stupid" elseif checkAfflictions({"confusion","paralysis"}) then d1 = "clumsy" d2 = "impatience" elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","clumsiness"}) then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "stupid" elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","stupidity"}) then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "dementia" elseif checkAfflictions({"nausea","clumsiness"}) then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "impatience" elseif checkAfflictions({"paralysis","stupidity"}) then d1 = "impatience" d2 = "paranoia" elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","dementia"}) then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "stupid" elseif checkAfflictions({"confusion","clumsiness"}) then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "impatience" elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","confusion"}) then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "stupid" elseif checkAfflictions({"stupidity","clumsiness"}) then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "impatience" elseif checkAfflictions({"confusion","stupidity"}) then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "impatience" elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","stupidity","dementia"}) then d1 = "paralyse" d2 = "clumsy" elseif function tzantzaCombo1() if not enemyAfflictions["paralysis"] then curse("paralyse") elseif not enemyAfflictions["impatience"] then curse("impatience") elseif not enemyAfflictions["stupidity"] then curse("stupid") elseif not enemyAfflictions["paranoia"] then curse("paranoia") elseif not enemyAfflictions["dementia"] then curse("dementia") else tzantza() end end

Script.name: Shaman Normal Lock
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function shamanNormalLock() if noAfflictions() then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"paralysis"}) then curse("haemophilia") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"asthma"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","paralysis"}) then curse("impatience") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","haemophilia"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","paralysis"}) then curse("haemophilia") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","impatience","paralysis"}) then relapseCurse("asthma","impatience") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","impatience","asthma"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","paralysis","asthma"}) then curse("impatience") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","paralysis","asthma"}) then curse("haemophilia") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","impatience","paralysis","asthma"}) then coagulateCurse("anorexia","slickness") elseif checkAfflictions({"anorexia","haemophilia","impatience","paralysis"}) then coagulateCurse("asthma","slickness") else echo("shamanNormalLock - NOTHING TO DO WITH\n") display(enemyAfflictions) end end

function shamanPeaceLoop() if noAfflictions() then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"paralysis"}) then curse("peace") elseif checkAfflictions({"peace"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"clumsiness"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"paralysis","peace"}) then curse("clumsy") elseif checkAfflictions({"clumsiness","peace"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"clumsiness","paralysis"}) then curse("peace") elseif checkAfflictions({"paralysis","peace","clumsiness"}) then puppetAttack("fashion") else echo("shamanPeaceLoop - NOTHING TO DO WITH\n") display(enemyAfflictions) end end

checkAfflictions({"stupidity"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","paralysis"}) then curse("haemophilia") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","stupidity"}) then checkAfflictions({"weariness","stupidity"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","paralysis"}) then curse("peace") elseif checkAfflictions({"peace","paralysis"}) then curse("haemophilia") elseif checkAfflictions({"asthma","haemophilia"}) then curse("peace") elseif checkAfflictions({"asthma","peace"}) then curse("haemophilia") elseif checkAfflictions({"peace","impatience","paralysis"}) then curse("haemophilia") elseif checkAfflictions({"weariness","stupidity","paralysis"}) then curse("haemophilia") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","stupidity","paralysis"}) then curse("peace") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","impatience","asthma"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","peace","impatience"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","peace","stupidity"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","peace","asthma"}) then relapseCurse("weariness","weariness") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","peace","paralysis"}) then relapseCurse("asthma","paralysis") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","peace","paralysis","asthma"}) then curse("weariness") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","weariness","peace","paralysis"}) then curse("asthma") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","peace","paralysis","impatience"}) then curse("asthma") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","peace","stupidity","paralysis"}) then curse("impatience") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","peace","asthma","weariness"}) then coagulateCurse("anorexia","slickness") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","peace","impatience","asthma"}) then coagulateCurse("anorexia","slickness") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","peace","asthma","weariness","paralysis"}) then coagulateCurse("anorexia","slickness") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","peace","impatience","paralysis","asthma"}) then coagulateCurse("anorexia","slickness") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","peace","stupidity","impatience","asthma"}) then coagulateCurse("anorexia","slickness") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","peace","stupidity","impatience","paralysis","asthma"}) then coagulateCurse("anorexia","slickness") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","peace","stupidity","impatience","asthma","anorexia","slickness"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"haemophilia","peace","paralysis","stupidity","impatience","asthma","anorexia","slickness"}) then curse("bleed") Iecho(target .." LOCKED - LOOK FOR INFLAME") elseif checkAfflictions({"anorexia","haemophilia","weariness","peace","paralysis","asthma","slickness"}) then curse("bleed") Iecho(target .." LOCKED - LOOK FOR INFLAME") elseif checkAfflictions({"anorexia","weariness","peace","paralysis","asthma","slickness"}) then curse("bleed") Iecho(target .." LOCKED - LOOK FOR INFLAME") elseif checkAfflictions({"stupidity","anorexia","weariness","peace","paralysis","asthma","slickness"}) then curse("bleed") Iecho(target .." LOCKED - LOOK FOR INFLAME") elseif checkAfflictions({"stupidity","anorexia","weariness","peace","paralysis","asthma","slickness"}) then curse("bleed") Iecho(target .." LOCKED - LOOK FOR INFLAME") else echo("shamanGroupLock - NOTHING TO DO WITH\n") display(enemyAfflictions) end end

Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function shamanPeaceClumsyHinder() if noAfflictions() then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"paralysis"}) then curse("peace") elseif checkAfflictions({"peace"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"clumsiness"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"paralysis","peace"}) then curse("clumsy") elseif checkAfflictions({"clumsiness","peace"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"clumsiness","paralysis"}) then curse("peace") elseif checkAfflictions({"paralysis","peace","clumsiness"}) then puppetAttack("fashion") else echo("shamanPeaceLoop - NOTHING TO DO WITH\n") display(enemyAfflictions) end end
function shamanPeaceStupidityHinder() if noAfflictions() then curse("paralyse",true) elseif checkAfflictions({"paralysis"}) then curse("peace",true) elseif checkAfflictions({"peace"}) then curse("paralyse",true) elseif checkAfflictions({"stupidity"}) then curse("paralyse",true) elseif checkAfflictions({"paralysis","peace"}) then curse("impatience",true) elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","peace"}) then curse("paralyse",true) elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","paralysis"}) then curse("peace",true) elseif checkAfflictions({"paralysis","peace","impatience"}) then curse("stupid",true) elseif checkAfflictions({"peace","impatience","stupidity"}) then curse("paralyse",true) elseif checkAfflictions({"paralysis","peace","impatience","stupidity"}) then puppetAttack("fashion",true) else echo("shamanPeaceStupidityHinder - NOTHING TO DO WITH\n") display(enemyAfflictions) end end

Script.name: Shaman Manaleech
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function shamanManaleech() if noAfflictions() then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"paralysis"}) then curse("impatience") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"asthma"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"stupidity"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","paralysis"}) then curse("asthma") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","asthma"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"asthma","impatience","paralysis"}) then relapseCurse("manaleech","paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"asthma","impatience","manaleech"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","paralysis","manaleech"}) then curse("asthma") elseif checkAfflictions({"asthma","impatience","paralysis","manaleech"}) then curse("stupid") elseif checkAfflictions({"manaleech","stupidity","impatience","asthma"}) then curse("paralyse") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","paralysis","manaleech","stupidity"}) then curse("asthma") elseif checkAfflictions({"asthma","impatience","paralysis","manaleech","stupidity"}) then curse("sleep") else echo("shamanManaleech - NOTHING TO DO WITH\n") display(enemyAfflictions) end end

Script.name: Aeon Lock
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function jesterAeonLock() if checkAfflictions({"aeon"}) then deliverVenom("handaxe","kalmia") elseif checkAfflictions({"aeon","asthma"}) then deliverVenom("handaxe","slike") elseif checkAfflictions({"aeon","anorexia"}) then deliverVenom("handaxe","kalmia") elseif checkAfflictions({"aeon","stupidity","asthma"}) then deliverVenom("handaxe","slike") elseif checkAfflictions({"aeon","asthma","anorexia"}) then deliverVenom("handaxe","aconite") elseif checkAfflictions({"aeon","asthma","slickness"}) then deliverVenom("handaxe","slike") elseif checkAfflictions({"aeon","slickness","paralysis"}) then deliverVenom("handaxe","kalmia") elseif checkAfflictions({"aeon","asthma","anorexia","stupidity"}) then deliverVenom("handaxe","gecko") elseif checkAfflictions({"aeon","slickness","stupidity","asthma"}) then deliverVenom("handaxe","slike") elseif checkAfflictions({"aeon","slickness","asthma","anorexia"}) then deliverVenom("handaxe","aconite") elseif checkAfflictions({"aeon","slickness","paralysis","asthma"}) then deliverVenom("handaxe","slike") elseif checkAfflictions({"aeon","stupidity","paralysis","asthma"}) then deliverVenom("handaxe","slike") elseif checkAfflictions({"aeon","anorexia","slickness","stupidity","asthma"}) then if tonumber(fashionCount) > 5 then puppetAttack("paralyse") else deliverVenom("handaxe","curare") end elseif checkAfflictions({"aeon","anorexia","slickness","stupidity","asthma","paralysis"}) then deliverVenom("handaxe","vernalius") elseif checkAfflictions({"aeon","anorexia","slickness","stupidity","asthma","paralysis","weariness"}) then prankAttack("slip "..target.." itchpowder") else echo("Dont know what to do with \n") display(enemyAfflictions) end end

Script.name: Pranks
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function prankAttack(attack) clearQueue() send(attack) end

Script.name: Necromancy
Script.script: ------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function necromancyAttack(attack) clearQueue() wieldShield() if attack == "vivisect" then send("vivisect " .. target) elseif attack =="feed" then send("feed "..target) elseif attack =="taint" then send("taint "..target) elseif attack =="decay" then send("decay "..target) else send(attack) end end

Script.name: Apostasy
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function apostasyAttack(attack) clearQueue() if attack == "demon corrupt" then send("demon corrupt " .. target) elseif attack == "puncture" then wieldShield() wieldDaegger("right") if usingQueueing then send("QUEUE ADD eqbal wipe daegger") send("QUEUE ADD eqbal envenom daegger with gecko") send("QUEUE ADD eqbal daegger puncture " .. target) else envenom("daegger","gecko") send("daegger puncture " .. target) end elseif attack == "summon daegger" then send("summon daegger",false) elseif attack == "demon sap" then send("demon sap " .. target) elseif attack == "demon stain" then send("demon stain " .. target) elseif attack == "demon strip" then send("demon strip " .. target) elseif attack == "contemplate" then catharsisGo = true send("contemplate " .. target) elseif attack == "cathContemplate" then send("contemplate " .. target) elseif attack == "demon catharsis" then send("demon catharsis " .. target) elseif attack == "targetBeckon" then send("demon beckon " .. target) else send(attack) end end

Script.name: Dstab
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function dstab(venom1,venom2) wieldShield() wieldDirk() send("purge") send("wipe " .. myDirk) send("secrete " .. venom1 .. " on " .. myDirk) send("secrete " .. venom2 .. " on " .. myDirk) send("dstab " .. target) end

Script.name: Deadeyes
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function deadeyes(d1,d2) wieldShield() clearQueue() applyDeadeye(d1,d2) send("deadeyes "..target.." "..d1.." "..d2) end
function deadeyed() targetAfflicted(afflictedDeadeye1) targetAfflicted(afflictedDeadeye2) end
function applyDeadeye(d1,d2) afflictedDeadeye1 = d1 afflictedDeadeye2 = d2 if afflictedDeadeye1 =="paralyse" then afflictedDeadeye1 = "paralysis" elseif afflictedDeadeye1 =="stupid" then afflictedDeadeye1 = "stupidity" elseif afflictedDeadeye1 =="clumsy" then afflictedDeadeye1 = "clumsiness" elseif afflictedDeadeye1 =="vomiting" then afflictedDeadeye1 = "nausea" end
if afflictedDeadeye2 =="paralyse" then afflictedDeadeye2 = "paralysis" elseif afflictedDeadeye2 =="stupid" then afflictedDeadeye2 = "stupidity" elseif afflictedDeadeye2 =="clumsy" then afflictedDeadeye2 = "clumsiness" elseif afflictedDeadeye2 =="vomiting" then afflictedDeadeye2 = "nausea" end end

Script.name: Runelore
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function sketchRune(rune,direction) clearQueue() if rune == "gular" then send("outr redink") send("sketch gular on ground "..direction) send("inr redink") elseif rune == "wunjo" then send("outr redink") send("sketch wunjo on ground") send("inr redink") elseif rune == "nairat" then send("outr yellowink") send("sketch nairat on ground") send("inr yellowink") end end

Script.name: Bombs
Script.script:

function changeBombTimer(time) bombTimer = time Iecho("<green> BOMB TIMER SET TO "..bombTimer.."<red>]\n") end

Script.name: Fling
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function useCard(card) clearQueue() if card == "universe" or card == "hermit" or card == "sun" then cardTarget = "ground" else cardTarget = target end
if card == "empress" then send("get monolith") end
if card == "hermit" then send("charge " .. card) send("fling " .. card .." at " .. cardTarget) else if usingQueueing then send("QUEUE ADD eqbal outd "..card) send("QUEUE ADD eqbal charge "..card) send("QUEUE ADD eqbal fling " .. card .." at " .. cardTarget) send("QUEUE ADD eqbal ind "..card) else send("outd " .. card) send("charge " .. card) send("fling " .. card .." at " .. cardTarget) send("ind " ..card) end end end
function useSelfCard(card) if card == "universe" or card == "hermit" then cardTarget = "ground" else cardTarget = "me" end
if usingQueueing then send("QUEUE ADD eqbal outd "..card) send("QUEUE ADD eqbal charge "..card) send("QUEUE ADD eqbal fling " .. card .." at " .. cardTarget) send("QUEUE ADD eqbal ind "..card) else send("outd " .. card) send("charge " .. card) send("fling " .. card .." at " .. cardTarget) send("ind " ..card) end end
function useAllyCard(card) if card == "universe" or card == "hermit" then cardTarget = "ground" else cardTarget = allyTarget end if card == "empress" then send("get monolith") end if usingQueueing then send("QUEUE ADD eqbal outd "..card) send("QUEUE ADD eqbal charge "..card) send("QUEUE ADD eqbal fling " .. card .." at " .. cardTarget) send("QUEUE ADD eqbal ind "..card) else send("outd " .. card) send("charge " .. card) send("fling " .. card .." at " .. cardTarget) send("ind " ..card) end end

Script.name: Juggling
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
juggledItems = { total = 0, handaxe = 0, dustbomb = 0, concussionbomb = 0, webbomb = 0, butterflybomb = 0 }
function juggle(item) wieldNothing("left") wieldPuppet(target) if item == "concussionbomb" then send("juggle ".. concussionBombTable[juggledItems["concussionbomb"]+1]) elseif item == "dustbomb" then send("juggle ".. dustBombTable[juggledItems["dustbomb"]+1]) end end
function juggled(item) juggledItems["total"] = juggledItems["total"] + 1 juggledItems[item] = juggledItems[item] + 1 --display(juggledItems) end
function itemThrown(item) if juggledItems[item] and juggledItems[item] > 0 then juggledItems["total"] = juggledItems["total"] - 1 juggledItems[item] = juggledItems[item] - 1 for k,v in pairs(juggledItems) do if juggledItems[k] < 0 then juggledItems[k] = 0 end end end end
function throwDirection(item,direction) if item == "concussionbomb" then if juggledItems[item] == 0 then juggle("concussionbomb") elseif juggledItems[item] > 0 then send("throw "..concussionBombTable[1].." "..direction) end elseif item == "dustbomb" then if juggledItems[item] == 0 then juggle("dustbomb") elseif juggledItems[item] > 0 then send("throw "..dustBombTable[1].." "..direction) end end end
function resetJuggles() for k,v in pairs(juggledItems) do juggledItems[k] = 0 end end

Script.name: Illusion Script
Serpent

function clearQueue() if usingQueueing and not svo.conf.paused then send("clearqueue all") end end

Script.name: Main Offensive Function
Script.script:

function sendAttack(attack) if onlyEnabledClass("serpent") then serpentOffensiveHinder() elseif onlyEnabledClass("apostate") then apostateOffensiveHinder() end send(attack) end
function sendHinderAttack(attack) send(attack) end

Script.name: Use Skill
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function puppetUsed(skill) fashionsUsed = 0 if skill == "cripple" then fashionsUsed = 7 elseif skill == "mangle" then fashionsUsed = 6 elseif skill == "break" then fashionsUsed = 2 elseif skill == "travel" then fashionsUsed = 5 elseif skill == "slow" then fashionsUsed = 10 elseif skill == "puncture" then fashionsUsed = 4 elseif skill == "summon" then fashionsUsed = 6 elseif skill == "bind" then fashionsUsed = 2 elseif skill == "blackout" then fashionsUsed = 4 elseif skill == "throttle" then fashionsUsed = 1 elseif skill == "listen" then fashionsUsed = 5 elseif skill == "concussion" then fashionsUsed = 20 elseif skill == "leech" then fashionsUsed = 5 elseif skill == "spy" then if tonumber(fashionCount) < 30 then fashionsUsed = 1 end elseif skill == "status" then if tonumber(fashionCount) < 30 then fashionsUsed = 1 end else fashionsUsed = 1 end
fashionCount = fashionCount - fashionsUsed echo("Fashions = " ..fashionCount) end

Script.name: Afflictions
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
enemyAfflictions = { ["aeon"] = false, ["asthma"] = false, ["nausea"] = false, ["anorexia"] = false, ["stupidity"] = false, ["slickness"] = false, ["weariness"] = false, ["paralysis"] = false, ["paranoia"] = false, ["dementia"] = false, ["clumsiness"] = false, ["dizziness"] = false, ["vomiting"] = false, ["addiction"] = false, ["confusion"] = false, ["impatience"] = false, ["epilepsy"] = false, ["peace"] = false, ["manaleech"] = false }
targetSpeedElixer = "haste"
showEnemyAffDisplay = false

Script.name: Target Afflicted
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function targetAfflicted(aff) if aff == "kalmia" then aff = "asthma" elseif aff == "gecko" then aff = "slickness" elseif aff == "slike" then aff = "anorexia" elseif aff == "aconite" then aff = "stupidity" elseif aff == "vernalius" then aff = "weariness" elseif aff == "curare" then aff = "paralysis" elseif aff == "aeon" then --changeBombTimer("3") end --addbackTreeLogic(aff) echo("*"..aff.."*") if aff ~= "breach" and aff ~= "sleep" and aff ~= "bleed" and aff ~= "plague" and aff ~= "sensitivity" then enemyAfflictions[aff] = true end lastAfflicted = aff if showEnemyAffDisplay then display(enemyAfflictions) end end

Script.name: Enemy Tree Logic
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function enemyTreeLogic2() if noAfflictions() then elseif checkAfflictions({"clumsiness"}) then removeEnemyAff("clumsiness") elseif checkAfflictions({"asthma"}) then removeEnemyAff("asthma") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience"}) then removeEnemyAff("impatience") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","clumsiness"}) then removeEnemyAff("clumsiness") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","asthma"}) then removeEnemyAff("impatience") elseif checkAfflictions({"confusion","clumsiness"}) then removeEnemyAff("clumsiness") elseif checkAfflictions({"confusion","asthma"}) then removeEnemyAff("confusion") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","addiction","clumsiness"}) then removeEnemyAff("clumsiness") elseif checkAfflictions({"aeon","asthma","anorexia"}) then removeEnemyAff("asthma") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","addiction","clumsiness"}) then removeEnemyAff("clumsiness") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","addiction","clumsiness"}) then removeEnemyAff("impatience") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","stupidity","clumsiness"}) then removeEnemyAff("clumsiness") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","stupidity","asthma"}) then send("check "..target.." for asthma") treeCheck = true elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","addiction","stupidity","clumsiness"}) then removeEnemyAff("stupidity") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","dementia","stupidity"}) then removeEnemyAff("stupidity") else display(enemyAfflictions) end end
function enemyTreeLogic() resetAllTargetAffs() end
function addbackTreeLogic(aff) if aff == "stupidity" and treeLost == "stupidity" and not enemyAfflictions["stupidity"] then Iecho("Removing "..treeNextLoss) removeEnemyAff(treeNextLoss) end end

Script.name: Enemy Shrugging Logic
Script.script:

function enemyShruggingLogic() if noAfflictions() then elseif enemyAfflictions["paralysis"] then removeEnemyAff("paralysis") elseif checkAfflictions({"clumsiness"}) then removeEnemyAff("clumsiness") elseif checkAfflictions({"asthma"}) then removeEnemyAff("asthma") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","clumsiness"}) then removeEnemyAff("clumsiness") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","asthma"}) then removeEnemyAff("impatience") elseif checkAfflictions({"confusion","clumsiness"}) then removeEnemyAff("clumsiness") elseif checkAfflictions({"confusion","asthma"}) then removeEnemyAff("confusion") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","addiction","clumsiness"}) then removeEnemyAff("clumsiness") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","addiction","clumsiness"}) then removeEnemyAff("impatience") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","stupidity","clumsiness"}) then removeEnemyAff("clumsiness") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","stupidity","asthma"}) then removeEnemyAff("stupidity") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","addiction","stupidity","clumsiness"}) then removeEnemyAff("stupidity") elseif checkAfflictions({"impatience","dementia","stupidity"}) then removeEnemyAff("stupidity") else display(enemyAfflictions) end end

Enemy Kelp Logic
